item.title: Snow Bros. Classic Collection announced for PS5, Switch, and PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch

Physical edition pre-orders open November 14.

Publisher Limited Run Games and developer Headless Chicken have announced Snow Bros. Classic Collection for PlayStation 5, Switch, and PC (Steam). It includes the Toaplan-developed arcade platformers Snow Bros., Snow Bros.: Nick & Tom, and Snow Bros. Jr.. PlayStation 5 and Switch physical edition pre-orders will open on November 14 via Limited Run Games.

Here is an overview of the collection, via its Steam page:

About

It’s always more fun to throw a snowball than to be hit by one!

Toaplan’s hit Snow Bros. is back! This arcade-style, fixed-screen platformer follows brothers Nick and Tom through epic levels in the Kingdom of Hottoda to save two trapped princesses, each possessing the magic of snow… and the only hope for the realm. As evil King Atchich seeks to take over the world, the snowmen we love must set out to storm the enemy’s fortress and rescue their princesses!

Shoot snow at your enemies, picking up items to enhance your fighting, from speed enhancements to shot powerups, becoming giant, and more. Each level features not only enemies but a boss fight, with unique characters to size up and snowball!

Whether you have loved them since the 90s or are just discovering the snowy goodness now, Snow Bros. will show you exactly why it’s such a timeless game.

Included Games

  • Snow Bros.
  • Snow Bros.: Nick & Tom
  • Snow Bros. Jr.

item.title: Sumikkogurashi Create a Wonderful Sumikko Island! coming west on November 20
item.content:encoded:
• Switch

Day and date with the Japanese release.

Nippon Columbia will release Sumikkogurashi Create a Wonderful Sumikko Island! for Switch via Nintendo eShop in the west on November 20, day and date with its previously announced Japanese release, the company announced. It will support English, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, and Simplified Chinese language options.

Here is an overview of the game, via Nintendo eShop:

About

Enjoy creating a cozy island that matches the seasons with the Sumikko!

In this game, you’ll build a cozy island together with Sumikko.

Collect materials, fulfill Sumikko’s requests, create various items, and decorate the island to make it popular!

The more the island becomes popular and developed, the more features are unlocked, like expanding areas and attracting other Sumikko to the island, so let’s work together with Sumikko and create a wonderful island!

Key Features

  • Fulfill Sumikko’s Request and Make Them Happy – Sumikko will make all sorts of “requests.” Fulfill them to raise Sumikko’s “Joy Meter”! These requests are time-sensitive, so don’t forget to fulfill them.
  • Gather Materials With Sumikko – Shirokuma, Penguin?, Tonkatsu, Neko and Tokage will gather the materials you need to build the island. When the player helps gather too, the amount of materials obtained increases!
  • Island-Building Fun – Use coins and the materials you gathered with Sumikko to create items you can place on the island. The Place items that you made can be freely placed within the layout area!
  • Create an Island That Matches the Seasons – On the island, there are four seasons. Not only does the scenery change, but you can also buy season-limited items at the shop, and enjoy lots of different seasonal events! To make your island match the current season, you’ll need to raise “Season Points” that show how close you are to matching the season. Get more Season Points by placing items with the same Season Points as the island’s current season!
  • Enjoy Sumikko’s Cute Moments – Sumikko will freely play or unwind using the items you place on the island to pass the time!

View the first English screenshots at the gallery.
